parameters: Why does this empty school have so many damn locked doors!?
How did you get down here?
I always thought it was an urban legend that a janitor actually put
kids into the furance! I can't believe this is true!
Up until now I only killed children, but I can make an exception this
one time and burn you too!
Always believe in yourself, because it's hilarious to see you do
What made you think you could take me? I have the Infinity Knuckles, ass!
And now, you'll burn with the rest of them...
